import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; export const FicheEnchere = () => { const [items, setItems] = useState([]); const login = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); window.location.replace('/login'); } useEffect(() => { fetch("http://192.168.43.146:8080/Produit/"+localStorage.getItem('id'),{ method: "GET" }) .then((response)=>response.json()) .then((json)=>setItems(json.data)); },[]); return ( <>
